src:
Dačić: Do kraja godine četiri-pet država povući će priznanje Kosova

05 Nov 2019, 09:05

Ministar spoljnih poslova Ivica Dačić najavio je danas da će do kraja godine "četiri-pet" država u svetu povući priznanje nezavisnosti Kosova. Reagujući na izjavu američkog izaslanika Metjua Palmera o riziku da Srbiji budu uvedene sankcije zbog kupovine ruske vojne opreme, ministar je za televiziju Hepi kazao da nema osnova za uvodjenje sankcija jer kako je naveo, "nismo glupi da ne znamo šta je dozvoljeno". Komentarišući navode da je u kontaktu sa liderom Pokreta slobodnih gradjana (PSG) Sergejem Trifunovićem i da je spreman na saradnju sa opozicijom, Dačić je ocenio da je suština tih optužbi da se "slomi naš otpor kad je reč o pitanju Kosova". "To je nebitna tema. Ko je taj Sergej Trifunović da se ja njemu pravdam? Dragana Djilasa nisam video od kad sam postao ministar. Očigledno je plan da ceo taj front bude usmeren ka tome da slomi naš otpor kada je reč o Kosovu i Metohiji. Oni rade protiv Vučića a ne protiv mene ali im je manje rizično da napadaju mene nego Vučića", kazao je Dačić.
text:
Dacic: By the end of the year, four to five countries will withdraw recognition of Kosovo

05 Nov 2019, 09:05

Foreign Minister Ivica Dacic announced today that "four to five" countries in the world will withdraw recognition of Kosovo's independence by the end of the year. Reacting to US envoy Matthew Palmer's statement about the risk of sanctions being imposed on Serbia over the purchase of Russian military equipment, the minister told Television Happy that there were no grounds for imposing sanctions because, as he stated, "we are not stupid not to know what is allowed". Commenting on allegations that he is in contact with the leader of the Free Citizens Movement (PSG), Sergei Trifunovic, and that he is ready to co-operate with the opposition, Dacic said that the essence of these allegations is that "our resistance to the Kosovo issue" is broken. "That is an irrelevant topic. Who is this Sergei Trifunovic that I should justify myself to? Dragan Djilas I have not seen since I became minister. Obviously the plan is to have this whole front aimed at breaking our resistance when it comes to Kosovo and Metohija. They work against Vucic and not against me, but they are less risky of attacking me than Vucic, "Dacic said.
